::Slayer::

Slayer nods. "Allright. But we'll need to get back to base 
undetected. If they counter-attack, we won't have much chance."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius follows his plan step by step.
> 
> "If you keep them close enough to you through the mountains I'd bet 
my
> rations that they'd continue the chase." he checked the ledge again 
seeing
> that there were only three sides he could be hit from he figured it 
was
> worth a shot. "We'll have them pinned so we'll have to act fast so 
they
> don't have the chance to call for reinforcements." It was a hit and 
run
> mission that required split second timing and flawless percission, 
but the
> odds were in thier favor.
